item.title: [Help]Portal case!
item.dc:creator: @bighomie112 bighomie112
item.description:
@bighomie112 wrote:

Also I forgot to add that
case 2465:
if (actionTimer == 0) {
selectoption(“Low train”, “Go to low train”, “I don’t wanna go”, “”);
OptionObject = objectID;
}
break; this is called in your
case :
sendFrame171(1, 2465 );
sendFrame171(0, 2468);
sendFrame126(“Select an Option”, 2460);
sendFrame126(“Take me to low train”, 2461);
sendFrame126(“I dont wanna go”, 2462);
sendFrame164(2459);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break; so you must still have it
So you can try this
case 2465:
if (actionTimer == 0) {
sendFrame171(5000) //If you use the 5000 as the case
OptionObject = objectID;
}
break;

Read full topic

item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Hey im working on my portal i have added it to makeGlobalObject and it spawn and all that.

What i added

client.java

Works

else if(OptionObject == 2465) { sendMessage ("You have been teleported to Low train"); teleportToX =2191; teleportToY =4950; OptionObject = -1; RemoveAllWindows(); }

Works

case 2465: if (actionTimer == 0) { selectoption("Low train", "Go to low train", "I don't wanna go", ""); OptionObject = objectID; } break;

I can’t fine the case i need help

case : sendFrame171(1, 2465 ); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460); sendFrame126("Take me to low train", 2461); sendFrame126("I dont wanna go", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;
